m_szDocTitle: GM Working On $30,000, 200-Mile EV That Could Compete With Tesla Model E | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: GM Working On $30,000, 200-Mile EV That Could Compete With Tesla Model E September 19th, 2013 by Important Media Cross-Post   Editor’s notes: Assumption is that Tesla’s affordable, 2017 EV will be called the Tesla Model E ; Tesla’s use of lithium-ion batteries (a different kind than used in laptops) will not result in a worldwide shortage of such batteries (video on that coming soon). Now, here’s Chris DeMorro’s post from Gas2 .
